charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a familiar voice.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_030:
Don’t get discouraged, Magearna. We’ll find
them...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_040:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... What a coincidence
running into you here.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0401_060: No, not really. I’m looking for someone...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0402_080:
I mean...kind of, but that’s not why I’m here
today. I’m looking for someone...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_100:
For some reason, Magearna was delivered to an
antique shop in Alola.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_110:
We don’t know who the sender or recipient were...
And we couldn’t find that recipient anywhere
in Alola.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_120:
It was taken in by the Aether Foundation, and
now I’m looking after it.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_130:
That said... I’m sure it wants to be with whoever
was supposed to receive it, if possible.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_140:
A lot of people from various regions have come to
Pasio, so I thought I might find a clue here...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_150:
Magearna...I’ll definitely find the person you
were meant to be delivered to.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_160: I’m just filling in for now so you don’t feel lonely...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0301_170: It seems to be saying no, though...?
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0401_180: I see... You think so, too?
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0402_200:
This might be my own ego talking, but I think it
was disagreeing with me.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_210:
I’ve heard that Magearna can understand
human speech...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_220:
If so, that means it really does want to be
with me?
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_240:
Maybe we were destined to be a sync pair all
along.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0401_260:
Yeah. Believing in fate isn’t so bad every once in
a while.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0302_270: I think you make a great team!
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_0402_280: Yeah? That means a lot, coming from you...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_290: Just like you and your partner Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_300:
People and Pokémon sometimes seem to find each
other by a strange twist of fate.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_310:
I’m not gonna let that stop me from searching for
whoever Magearna was supposed to be sent to.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_320: But if we do find them...
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_330:
I’ll let Magearna decide whether it wants to stay
with me or be with them.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_340:
For now, I’ll do my best to be someone it wants to
choose, and to convince that other Trainer, too.
charaepi_ch0119_10_gladion/2301_1201_350: Until then...stay by my side, Magearna.
